title: Auto detect Analog input
body:
Okay so when I start the game, it says that 
"Auto Detect (Analog Input)
Cannot Display This Video Mode
Optimun resolution 1280x1024 " 
This never happenned to me before, it happened after the latest update and I don't know what to do ! I've tried reinstalling it, didn't work

replies.body:
This sounds related to a current issue being tracked in the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Try the following workarounds to fix this up:

1.  Press "Alt+Enter" together when on the black screen


2.  Log in to League of Legends
Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

I hope that helps!
